title: Patta Potta Monta (Going Wild)
synopsis: Three monkey brothers from the from an urban city go to live in the countryside. There's no convenience store nor arcades there; truly bare-bones. The story follows their daily lives trying to make friends and have fun amongst the villagers.
staff: [['Saotome, Yuusaku', ['Director']], ['Sister MAYO', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Higashide, Futoshi', ['Character Design']]]
